content: SPX-L masonry X-Change module (inch) Ultimate X-Change module for coring in all types of masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (above 1 3/8 diameter) â€“ precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Unique Hilti X-Change module system (2 to 8 diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Designed for the most challenging conditions, the core bit excels in concrete with a high rebar content Save significant space and weight by replacing traditional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module) The X-Change barrel can be used for the life of multiple modules Applications Hand-held dry coring in all types of masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U Base materials: Masonry Drilling Mode: Hand-held, Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U | Base materials | Masonry | Drilling Mode | Hand-held, Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Dry | Laser welded segments | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2215845 - X-Change module 2 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215846 - X-Change module 2 1/2 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215847 - X-Change module 3 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215849 - X-Change module 3 1/2 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215850 - X-Change module 4 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215851 - X-Change module 4 1/2 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215852 - X-Change module 5 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc - 2215478 - X-Change module 6 SPX-L mason. - Package Size 1 pc
